Details of confirmed and suspected cases in Thailand (As of 2 March 2020)

Status                In hospital  Deaths  Discharged  Total

Confirmed cases     11              1            31           43

Suspected cases     1380          0           1872        3252

Summary of confirmed cases in Thailand (As of 2 March 2020)

Classification Total

Cases found in Chinese nationals 25
Cases found in Thai nationals with travel history to China 1
Passengers on board the evacuation flight from Wuhan 1
Cases found in Thai nationals with travel history to Japan 4
Cases found in Thai nationals with travel history to South Korea 1
Cases found in Thai tourism-related worker (domestic cases) 6
Cases found in Thai medical worker (domestic cases) 1
Other domestic cases 4

泰国的多数都是外国输入，看看出院人数，算是处理的不错了。
